middle.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the part of your body around your waist and stomach
middle.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: He was holding a towel around his middle.
middle.translation[1].definitions[0].def: nearest the centre and furthest from the edge, top, end etc
middle.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: driving in the middle lane of the motorway
the middle drawer of the filing cabinet
middle.translation[1].definitions[1].def: half of the way through an event or period of time
middle.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: They spent the middle part of their vacation in Florida.
the middle part of the day
middle.translation[1].definitions[2].def: between two extreme levels or positions, for example between the best and worst, the biggest and smallest etc
middle.translation[1].definitions[2].exa: a car in the middle price range
the middle ranks of the army
